deploy-with-git: # This script deploys on remote server using GIT
deploy-with-git-simple: # This script deploys on remote server using GIT with just the commit id
deploy-with-package: # This script deploys on remote server using a package
deploy-with-local-package: # This script deploy on remote server using a local package
archive-remote: # Build an archive on remote server
clean: # delete files in cache directory of the script
clean-all: # delete and recreate the whole cache directory of the script
clean-repo: # delete and recreate the repository directory of the script
changelog: # generate the changelog between 2 commit ids
check-git-remote: # connect to remote server to check GIT commit id and branch
deploy-git-local: # Clone project from GIT in repository and install on local machine
deploy-git-remote: # Clone project from GIT in remote directory and install on remote server
test: # Testing that the site is working
repo-local: # Local clone project from GIT, choose the commit id, update the local repo and generate a changelog
update-git-remote: # Remote update from GIT with a commit id
